show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
My guest Dr.Bonnie Burstow is a dedicated lifelong Canadian activist in the psychiatric reform movement. <!--more--> She is taking the campaign against electroshock “treatment” (ECT) to a new level–organizing professionals to stand up against this brain-damaging procedure.
Dr Burstow and I discuss ECT, including what the existence of this barbaric “therapy” says about psychiatry as an institution.
